definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Matt is a Chemical Engineering at Laurentian University.
sentences.chinese: 馬特是在勞倫琴大學化學工程。

sentences.english: He graduated with a degree in chemical engineering in 1945.
sentences.chinese: 1945年，他大學畢業了，取得化學工程專業學位。

sentences.english: I'm in the American Institute of Chemical Engineers group at Yale.
sentences.chinese: 我參加了耶魯的美國化學工程學會。

sentences.english: A leaf is a beautiful thing. It is also a wonder of chemical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 一片樹葉是如此美麗，它是化學工程的奇觀。

sentences.english: In the fall, she's going to Harvard to study chemical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 今年秋天她將上哈佛大學學化學工程。

sentences.english: We also try to provide advice to other undergraduates majoring in chemical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 我們還會爲化學工程專業的本科生提供諮詢。

sentences.english: She studied chemical engineering at the University of California, Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 她曾就讀於加州大學洛杉磯分校的化學工程專業。

sentences.english: Why did you choose Chemical Engineering as your major?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼選擇化學工程這個專業呢？
